Belgium: Charles V issues decree establishing protocols and procedure of the reorganized Council of Luxembourg.
Brazil: São Vicente is established as the first permanent Portuguese settlement in Brazil.
Chile:
Francisco Pizarro arrives in Peru from Panamá. He begins the Conquest of the Inca Empire and captures Emperor Atahualpa during the Battle of Cajamarca.
A possible date for the battle of the Maule between Incas and Mapuches.
Cuba: The first slave rebellion is crushed.
France: Francis I issued an edict incorporating Brittany into the kingdom of France.
India: Ahoms under king Suhungmung defeat Turbak Khan of the Bengal Sultanate in Battle of Hatbor.
Peru: Conquistador Francisco Pizarro landed on the northern coast of Peru. Pizarro arrived at Cajamarca. Battle of Cajamarca The Spanish army took the Inca emperor Atahualpa prisoner, marking the end of his empire.
Slovenia: The Siege of Maribor ends in a defensive victory.
